description:
When new documents are uploaded to KB, automatically queue embedding generation in background during idle system time. Frontload indexing cost so first query is instant instead of triggering on-demand processing.

**Rationale:** First RAG query after KB update incurs indexing latency while embeddings generate. Users wait unnecessarily when this could happen proactively. Pre-warming eliminates first-query delay through predictive processing.
title: Background Pre-warming of Knowledge Base Embeddings
